00039 struct cstrcmp_eq : public std::binary_function<const char*, const char*, bool>
00040 {
00041         bool operator () (const char* s1, const char* s2) const
00042         {
00043                 return strcmp(s1, s2) == 0;
00044         }
00045 };
00046 
00048 
00049 struct cstricmp_eq : public std::binary_function<const char*, const char*, bool>
00050 {
00051         bool operator () (const char* s1, const char* s2) const
00052         {
00053                 return stricmp(s1, s2) == 0;
00054         }
00055 };
00056 
00058 
00060 
00061 struct cstrcmp_less : public std::binary_function<const char*, const char*, bool>
00062 {
00063         bool operator () (const char* s1, const char* s2) const
00064         {
00065                 return strcmp(s1, s2) < 0;
00066         }
00067 };
00068 
00070 
00071 struct cstricmp_less : public std::binary_function<const char*, const char*, bool>
00072 {
00073         bool operator () (const char* s1, const char* s2) const
00074         {
00075                 return stricmp(s1, s2) < 0;
00076         }
00077 };

00083 struct cstr_hash
00084 {
00085         size_t operator() (const char* s) const
00086     {
00087                 unsigned long h = 0;
00088                 for ( ; *s; ++s)
00089                 {
00090                         char c = *s;
00091                         h = 5 * h + c;
00092                 }
00093                 return size_t(h);
00094         }
00095 };
00096 
00098 
00100 
00101 struct str_hash
00102 {
00103         size_t operator() (const std::string& s) const
00104     {
00105                 cstr_hash h;
00106                 return h(s.c_str());
00107         }
00108 };
